response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $120. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $140. This offer allows us both to benefit: you get a great deal on a product you value at $150, and I ensure a fair return for my efforts in sourcing and presenting this item to you. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 140}
